task.question: What were the four horns that replaced the horn that was broken off the shaggy goat in Daniel’s vision (Dan 8:22)?

choices.choice: Four corners of the earth from which the Israelites would be regathered
Four cities that would follow Babylon
Four kingdom that would emerge from Greece
Four rulers who would rule over Israel until the end

task.answer: Four kingdom that would emerge from Greece

task.question: All of the following will happen in the latter part of the four horns’ reign EXCEPT (Dan 8:23)?

choices.choice: Rebels would becomecompletely wicked
A messenger of the evil one would come
A stern-faced king would arise
A master of intrigue would arise

task.answer: A messenger of the evil one would come

task.question: What will the stern-faced king do (Dan 8:24)?

choices.choice: He will cause astounding devastation and will succeed
He will destroy the temple of God and destroy many
He will ride on a white horse and the world will go after him
He will destroy the kingdom of Belshazzar and set up his own kingdom

task.answer: He will cause astounding devastation and will succeed

task.question: The stern-faced king that will arise out of the four horns will do all of the following EXCEPT (Dan 8:24f)

choices.choice: Take his stand against the Prince of princes
Destroy the mighty men and holy people
Cause deceit to prosper
Destroy the temple of the Most High

task.answer: Destroy the temple of the Most High

task.question: How will the stern-faced king that will arise out of the four horns be destroyed (Dan 8:25)?

choices.choice: Another terrible beast will arise and destroy him
Not by human power
A large stone will come down on him
He will be betrayed

task.question: What is Daniel told to do with the vision of the evenings and mornings (Dan 8:26)?

choices.choice: Seal it up for it concerns the distant future
Tell it to the holy people to encourage them
Look for it to come for the time is drawing near
Write it down and put it in a jar

task.answer: Seal it up for it concerns the distant future

task.question: What happened to Daniel after the vision of the ram and goat (Dan 8:27)?

choices.choice: He was called into the king’s presence to explain it
He saw another vision which helped him undersand
He was exhausted and lay ill for several days
He wrote the vision down and gave it to Baruch the scribe

task.answer: He was exhausted and lay ill for several days

task.question: Who was the son of Xerxes the Persian king (Dan 9:1)?

choices.choice: Cyrus
Artaxerxes
Shalmaneser
Darius

task.question: Darius was from what group by descent (Dan 9:1)?

choices.choice: Persians
Chaldeans
Medes
Arameans

task.question: How did Daniel know that the desolation of Jerusalem would last seventy years (Dan 9:2)?

choices.choice: From the word of the Lord given to Jeremiah
From the word of the Lord given to Ezekiel
From the word of the Lord in a night vision
From the Book of the Law

task.answer: From the word of the Lord given to Jeremiah
